metadata.description: Claude Code skills for document processing and productivity

plugins.name: google-docs
plugins.description: Read and extract content from Google Docs including text and images. Supports section extraction with image analysis.

plugins.name: asana-task-analyzer
plugins.description: Analyze Asana tasks for implementers. Extracts requirements, flags unclear items, provides actionable steps. Requires Asana MCP.

plugins.name: handle-mr-feedback
plugins.description: Analyze GitLab MR review comments, validate against code with subagents, let user select items, and create implementation plan. Requires glab CLI.
